    • Uses of Box in it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.model.boxes

      Subclasses of Box in it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.model.boxes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlienBox
      Class that represent the starting sector for the aliens on the map.
      class  DangerousBox
      Class that represent a dangerous sector on the map, provides an overrided getter that signals you have to draw sector cards here
      class  HumanBox
      Class that represent the starting sector for the humans on the map.
      class  LifeboatBox
      Class that represent a lifeboat ship on the map, provides an overrided getter that signals that you can escape from the main ship from here
      class  Wall
      Class that represent a wall on the map, provides an overrided getter that signals that you can't cross this box
